comments.content:
Mutek (Music, Sound and New Technologies) is a Montreal based festival. They also do international events and release cd compilations.   
   
You can have some info here : [http://www.mutek.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126075538/http:/www.mutek.ca/)   
   
Regarding this logo, I believe that it's not made from a font. It was originaly created a couple years ago by a local designer and has been very slightly modified every year using a special grid.   
   
It may be inspired form a font, but I can't say which one.   
   
I'm not 100% sure about this answer. I hope someone will be able do confirm what I say.   
   
Good luck,   
   
jf

Nice ! I'm actually listening to your set on the website. I attend Mutek shows every year but I didn't have the chance to see you performing.   
   
Now, about the logo...   
   
To answer your original question, I contacted a friend of mine that is working on the graphic design for Mutek 2004 (probably not the whole thing, but a part of it). He then asked his boss who said that he slightly changed the logo himself last year... not using a font but using a grid. I agree with you that the logo always looked like that, but I believe that there have been some minor changes.   
   
But again, I don't know who is the original designer. He/She might have been inspired by a font.
